00038 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 //  CLASS : sc_fifo_in<T>
00040 //
00041 //  The sc_fifo<T> input port class.
00042 // ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 
00044 template <class T>
00045 class sc_fifo_in
00046 : public sc_port<sc_fifo_in_if<T>,0,SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND>
00047 {
00048 public:
00049 
00050     // typedefs
00051 
00052     typedef T                                       data_type;
00053 
00054     typedef sc_fifo_in_if<data_type>                if_type;
00055     typedef sc_port<if_type,0,SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND> base_type;
00056     typedef sc_fifo_in<data_type>                   this_type;
00057 
00058     typedef if_type                                 in_if_type;
00059     typedef sc_port_b<in_if_type>                   in_port_type;
00060 
00061 public:
00062 
00063     // constructors
00064 
00065     sc_fifo_in()
00066       : base_type()
00067       , m_written_finder_p()
00068     {}
00069 
00070     explicit sc_fifo_in( const char* name_ )
00071       : base_type( name_ )
00072       , m_written_finder_p()
00073     {}
00074 
00075     explicit sc_fifo_in( in_if_type& interface_ )
00076       : base_type( interface_ )
00077       , m_written_finder_p()
00078     {}
00079 
00080     sc_fifo_in( const char* name_, in_if_type& interface_ )
00081       : base_type( name_, interface_ )
00082       , m_written_finder_p()
00083     {}
00084 
00085     explicit sc_fifo_in( in_port_type& parent_ )
00086       : base_type( parent_ )
00087       , m_written_finder_p()
00088     {}
00089 
00090     sc_fifo_in( const char* name_, in_port_type& parent_ )
00091       : base_type( name_, parent_ )
00092       , m_written_finder_p()
00093     {}
00094 
00095     sc_fifo_in( this_type& parent_ )
00096       : base_type( parent_ )
00097       , m_written_finder_p()
00098     {}
00099 
00100     sc_fifo_in( const char* name_, this_type& parent_ )
00101       : base_type( name_, parent_ )
00102       , m_written_finder_p()
00103     {}
00104 
00105 
00106     // destructor
00107 
00108     virtual ~sc_fifo_in()
00109     {
00110         delete m_written_finder_p;
00111     }
00112 
00113 
00114     // interface access shortcut methods
00115 
00116     // blocking read
00117 
00118     void read( data_type& value_ )
00119         { (*this)->read( value_ ); }
00120 
00121     data_type read()
00122         { return (*this)->read(); }
00123 
00124 
00125     // non-blocking read
00126 
00127     bool nb_read( data_type& value_ )
00128         { return (*this)->nb_read( value_ ); }
00129 
00130 
00131     // get the number of available samples
00132 
00133     int num_available() const
00134         { return (*this)->num_available(); }
00135 
00136 
00137     // get the data written event
00138 
00139     const sc_event& data_written_event() const
00140         { return (*this)->data_written_event(); }
00141 
00142 
00143     // use for static sensitivity to data written event
00144 
00145     sc_event_finder& data_written() const
00146     {
00147         return sc_event_finder::cached_create
00148                 ( m_written_finder_p, *this,  &in_if_type::data_written_event );
00149     }
00150 
00151     virtual const char* kind() const
00152         { return "sc_fifo_in"; }
00153 
00154 private:
00155     mutable sc_event_finder* m_written_finder_p;
00156 
00157     // disabled
00158     sc_fifo_in( const this_type& );
00159     this_type& operator = ( const this_type& );
00160 };

00170 
00171 template <class T>
00172 class sc_fifo_out
00173 : public sc_port<sc_fifo_out_if<T>,0,SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND>
00174 {
00175 public:
00176 
00177     // typedefs
00178 
00179     typedef T                                        data_type;
00180 
00181     typedef sc_fifo_out_if<data_type>                if_type;
00182     typedef sc_port<if_type,0,SC_ONE_OR_MORE_BOUND>  base_type;
00183     typedef sc_fifo_out<data_type>                   this_type;
00184 
00185     typedef if_type                                  out_if_type;
00186     typedef sc_port_b<out_if_type>                   out_port_type;
00187 
00188 public:
00189 
00190     // constructors
00191 
00192     sc_fifo_out()
00193       : base_type()
00194       , m_read_finder_p()
00195     {}
00196

00198       : base_type( name_ )
00199       , m_read_finder_p()
00200     {}
00201 
00202     explicit sc_fifo_out( out_if_type& interface_ )
00203       : base_type( interface_ )
00204       , m_read_finder_p()
00205     {}
00206 
00207     sc_fifo_out( const char* name_, out_if_type& interface_ )
00208       : base_type( name_, interface_ )
00209       , m_read_finder_p()
00210     {}
00211 
00212     explicit sc_fifo_out( out_port_type& parent_ )
00213       : base_type( parent_ )
00214       , m_read_finder_p()
00215     {}
00216 
00217     sc_fifo_out( const char* name_, out_port_type& parent_ )
00218       : base_type( name_, parent_ )
00219       , m_read_finder_p()
00220     {}
00221 
00222     sc_fifo_out( this_type& parent_ )
00223       : base_type( parent_ )
00224       , m_read_finder_p()
00225     {}
00226 
00227     sc_fifo_out( const char* name_, this_type& parent_ )
00228       : base_type( name_, parent_ )
00229       , m_read_finder_p()
00230     {}
00231 
00232 
00233     // destructor
00234 
00235     virtual ~sc_fifo_out()
00236     {
00237         delete m_read_finder_p;
00238     }
00239 
00240 
00241     // interface access shortcut methods
00242 
00243     // blocking write
00244 
00245     void write( const data_type& value_ )
00246         { (*this)->write( value_ ); }
00247 
00248 
00249     // non-blocking write
00250 
00251     bool nb_write( const data_type& value_ )
00252         { return (*this)->nb_write( value_ ); }
00253 
00254 
00255     // get the number of free spaces
00256 
00257     int num_free() const
00258         { return (*this)->num_free(); }
00259 
00260 
00261     // get the data read event
00262 
00263     const sc_event& data_read_event() const
00264         { return (*this)->data_read_event(); }
00265 
00266 
00267     // use for static sensitivity to data read event
00268 
00269     sc_event_finder& data_read() const
00270     {
00271         return sc_event_finder::cached_create
00272                 ( m_read_finder_p, *this, &out_if_type::data_read_event );
00273     }
00274 
00275     virtual const char* kind() const
00276         { return "sc_fifo_out"; }
00277 
00278 private:
00279     mutable sc_event_finder* m_read_finder_p;
00280 
00281     // disabled
00282     sc_fifo_out( const this_type& );
00283     this_type& operator = ( const this_type& );
00284 };
